headline: Chipotle: In A Tough Spot As Price Hikes May Trigger Further Sales Deterioration
summary: Chipotle has faced decelerating comparable sales growth trends amid customer backlash on rising prices and smaller portion sizes. See why CMG stock is a Sell.
